get.description: Get the list of pull requests queued in each merge queue, organized by partition name

schema.title: Response Repository Partitions Repos  Owner   Repository  Partitions Get

get.description: Get all the ongoing or scheduled freezes for the repository specified in the path

post.description: Create a scheduled freeze for the repository specified in the path

patch.description: Update an existing scheduled freeze on the repository specified in the path

400.description: The scheduled freeze `start`, `timezone` and `matching_conditions` attributes cannot be updated, because the scheduled freeze has already started

404.description: The scheduled freeze with the given id does not exist

delete.description: Delete an existing scheduled freeze on the repository specified in the path

404.description: The scheduled freeze with the given id does not exist

post.description: Delete an existing scheduled freeze on the repository specified in the path

404.description: The scheduled freeze with the given id does not exist

partitions.title: Partitions
partitions.description: A dictionary containing partition names as keys and, as a value of those key, the list of pull requests queued in the partition. If partition are not used in this repository, the default partition name used will be `__default__`.

check_type.title: Check Type
check_type.description: The type of queue check (in_place or draft_pr)

pull_request_number.title: Pull Request Number
pull_request_number.description: The number of the pull request used by the speculative check

started_at.title: Started At
started_at.description: The timestamp when the checks have started for this pull request

ended_at.title: Ended At
ended_at.description: The timestamp when the checks have ended for this pull request

state.title: State
state.description: The global state of the checks

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: The reason for the scheduled freeze.

start.title: Start
start.description: When the scheduled freeze begins (date and time in ISO 8601 format without TZ). Begins now if the attribute is null.

end.title: End
end.description: When the scheduled freeze ends (date and time in ISO 8601 format without TZ).

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone where the freeze is expected to happen.

matching_conditions.title: Matching Conditions
matching_conditions.description: List of conditions used to match pull requests that need to be frozen during the scheduled freeze.

size.title: Size
size.description: The number of items in this page

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: The number of items per page

pull_requests.title: Pull Requests
pull_requests.description: The pull requests in this queue

BASE_BRANCH_CHANGED.title: Base Branch Changed
BASE_BRANCH_CHANGED.description: The pull request base branch has changed

BASE_BRANCH_MISSING.title: Base Branch Missing
BASE_BRANCH_MISSING.description: The base branch does not exist anymore

BATCH_MAX_FAILURE_RESOLUTION_ATTEMPTS.title: Batch Max Failure Resolution Attempts
BATCH_MAX_FAILURE_RESOLUTION_ATTEMPTS.description: The maximum batch failure resolution attempts has been reached

BRANCH_UPDATE_FAILED.title: Branch Update Failed
BRANCH_UPDATE_FAILED.description: The pull request can't be updated for security reasons

CHECKS_FAILED.title: Checks Failed
CHECKS_FAILED.description: The checks for the queued pull request have failed.

CHECKS_TIMEOUT.title: Checks Timeout
CHECKS_TIMEOUT.description: The checks for the queued pull request have timed out.

CONFLICT_WITH_BASE_BRANCH.title: Conflict With Base Branch
CONFLICT_WITH_BASE_BRANCH.description: The pull request conflicts with the base branch

CONFLICT_WITH_PULL_AHEAD.title: Conflict With Pull Ahead
CONFLICT_WITH_PULL_AHEAD.description: The pull request conflicts with at least one pull request ahead in queue

DRAFT_PULL_REQUEST_CHANGED.title: Draft Pull Request Changed
DRAFT_PULL_REQUEST_CHANGED.description: The draft pull request has been unexpectedly changed

INCOMPATIBILITY_WITH_BRANCH_PROTECTIONS.title: Incompatibility With Branch Protections
INCOMPATIBILITY_WITH_BRANCH_PROTECTIONS.description: The pull request cannot be checked because of an incompatibility with branch protections

MERGE_QUEUE_RESET.title: Merge Queue Reset
MERGE_QUEUE_RESET.description: The merge queue has been reset

PR_AHEAD_DEQUEUED.title: Pr Ahead Dequeued
PR_AHEAD_DEQUEUED.description: A pull request ahead in the queue has been dequeued.

BATCH_AHEAD_FAILED.title: Batch Ahead Failed
BATCH_AHEAD_FAILED.description: A pull request ahead in the queue failed to get merged.

PR_CHECKS_STOPPED_BECAUSE_MERGE_QUEUE_PA.title: Pr Checks Stopped Because Merge Queue Pause
PR_CHECKS_STOPPED_BECAUSE_MERGE_QUEUE_PA.description: The checks have been interrupted because the merge queue is paused on this repository

PR_DEQUEUED_FROM_PARTITION.title: Pr Dequeued From Partition
PR_DEQUEUED_FROM_PARTITION.description: Pull request has been dequeued from a partition

PR_QUEUED_TWICE.title: Pr Queued Twice
PR_QUEUED_TWICE.description: A pull request was queued twice.

PR_UNEXPECTEDLY_FAILED_TO_MERGE.title: Pr Unexpectedly Failed To Merge
PR_UNEXPECTEDLY_FAILED_TO_MERGE.description: Pull request unexpectedly failed to get merged

PR_WITH_HIGHER_PRIORITY_QUEUED.title: Pr With Higher Priority Queued
PR_WITH_HIGHER_PRIORITY_QUEUED.description: A pull request with a higher priority has been queued.

PULL_REQUEST_UPDATED.title: Pull Request Updated
PULL_REQUEST_UPDATED.description: The pull request has been unexpectedly updated

QUEUE_RULE_MISSING.title: Queue Rule Missing
QUEUE_RULE_MISSING.description: The queue rules are missing because of a configuration change.

SPECULATIVE_CHECK_NUMBER_REDUCED.title: Speculative Check Number Reduced
SPECULATIVE_CHECK_NUMBER_REDUCED.description: The number of speculative checks, in the queue rules, has been reduced.

PR_MANUALLY_MERGED.title: Pr Manually Merged
PR_MANUALLY_MERGED.description: The pull request has been manually merged.

DRAFT_PULL_REQUEST_CREATION_FAILED.title: Draft Pull Request Creation Failed
DRAFT_PULL_REQUEST_CREATION_FAILED.description: The draft pull request cannot be created.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: The reason of the queue pause

pause_date.title: Pause Date
pause_date.description: The date and time of the freeze

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: The reason of the queue pause

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the queue rule

config.description: The configuration of the queue rule

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: The queues configuration of the repository

message.title: Message
message.description: The message of the Mergify check run simulation

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the Mergify check run simulation

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: The summary of the Mergify check run simulation

partition_name.title: Partition Name
partition_name.description: The name of the partition, if no partition are used the partition name will be `__default__`

queues.title: Queues
queues.description: The time to merge data for each queue in the current partition

time_to_merge.description: The time to merge data for the partition's queue

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: The reason for the scheduled freeze.

start.title: Start
start.description: When the scheduled freeze begins (date and time in ISO 8601 format without TZ). Can only be updated if the scheduled freeze has not yet begun. Begins now if the attribute is null.

end.title: End
end.description: When the scheduled freeze ends (date and time in ISO 8601 format without TZ).

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone where the freeze is expected to happen.

matching_conditions.title: Matching Conditions
matching_conditions.description: List of conditions used to match pull requests that need to be frozen during the scheduled freeze. Can only be updated if the scheduled freeze has not yet begun.

number.title: Number
number.description: The number of the pull request

position.title: Position
position.description: The position of the pull request in the queue. The first pull request in the queue is at position 0

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The priority of this pull request

effective_priority.title: Effective Priority
effective_priority.description: The effective priority of this pull request

priority_alias.title: Priority Alias
priority_alias.description: The priority textual value of this pull request

queue_rule.description: The queue rule associated to this pull request

queued_at.title: Queued At
queued_at.description: The timestamp when the pull requested has entered in the queue

mergeability_check.description: Information about the mergeability check currently processed

estimated_time_of_merge.title: Estimated Time Of Merge
estimated_time_of_merge.description: The estimated timestamp when this pull request will be merged

number.title: Number
number.description: The number of the pull request

position.title: Position
position.description: The position of the pull request in the queue. The first pull request in the queue is at position 0

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The priority of this pull request

effective_priority.title: Effective Priority
effective_priority.description: The effective priority of this pull request

priority_alias.title: Priority Alias
priority_alias.description: The priority textual value of this pull request

queue_rule.description: The queue rule associated to this pull request

queued_at.title: Queued At
queued_at.description: The timestamp when the pull requested has entered in the queue

mergeability_check.description: Information about the mergeability check currently processed

estimated_time_of_merge.title: Estimated Time Of Merge
estimated_time_of_merge.description: The estimated timestamp when this pull request will be merged

partition_name.title: Partition Name
partition_name.description: The name of the partition, if any, in which the pull request is queued

in_place.title: In Place
in_place.description: Whether the pull request has been checked in-place

number.title: Number
number.description: The number of the pull request used by the speculative check

started_at.title: Started At
started_at.description: The timestamp when the checks have started for this pull request

ended_at.title: Ended At
ended_at.description: The timestamp when the checks have ended for this pull request

checks.title: Checks
checks.description: The list of pull request checks

evaluated_conditions.title: Evaluated Conditions
evaluated_conditions.description: The queue rule conditions evaluation report

state.title: State
state.description: The global state of the checks
